game.name: Anvira: Forge Defense
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Defend Anvilium from endless waves of goblins and monsters! A tower defense roguelite where you deploy mighty golems, unleash powerful spells, and craft crazy builds through deep customization. Adapt your strategy, grow stronger, and see how long you can survive against ever-escalating threats.
